GONE GIRL.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?

THE RACKETEER.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange this information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.

FIFTY SHADES OF GREY.description: A college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.

SAFE HAVEN.description: A young woman, while putting down roots in a small North Carolina town, is haunted by a dark secret from her past.

THE FORGOTTEN.description: The military investigator John Puller probes his aunt’s mysterious death in Florida.

MERRY CHRISTMAS, ALEX CROSS.description: Detective Alex Cross confronts both a hostage situation and a terrorist act at Christmas.

THREAT VECTOR.contributor: by Tom Clancy with Mark Greaney
THREAT VECTOR.description: As China threatens to invade Taiwan, the covert intelligence expert Jack Ryan Jr. aids his father’s administration  — but his agency is no longer secret.

NOTORIOUS NINETEEN.description: The New Jersey bounty hunter Stephanie Plum tracks a con man who disappeared from a hospital.

LIFE OF PI.description: A teenage boy and a 450-pound tiger are thrown together in a lifeboat after a shipwreck; now a movie.

THE BLACK BOX.description: The Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch links the bullet from a recent crime to the killing of a young female photographer during race riots in 1992.

THE CASUAL VACANCY.description: The sudden death of a parish councilman reveals bitter social divisions in an idyllic English town.

FIFTY SHADES DARKER.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.

FIFTY SHADES FREED.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.

THE COINCIDENCE OF CALLIE AND KAYDEN.description: A boy and girl, both of whom have tragedy in their past, come together after a chance encounter in college.

THE LAST MAN.description: The counterterrorism operative Mitch Rapp searches for a missing C.I.A. asset amid treachery in Afghanistan.

CROSS ROADS.description: A comatose businessman encounters Jesus, the Holy Spirit and God; from the author of “The Shack.”

11/22/63.description: An English teacher travels back to 1958 by way of a time portal in a Maine diner. His assignment: Stop Lee Harvey Oswald.

THE TWELVE TRIBES OF HATTIE.description: Fifty-some years in the life of an African-American family whose matriarch arrives in Philadelphia in 1923.

THE TIME KEEPER.description: Banished for centuries, the inventor of the world’s first clock tries to redeem himself by teaching two earthly people the true meaning of time.

FALLEN TOO FAR.description: A sheltered 19-year-old girl falls in love with her spoiled, sexy stepbrother.

HOPELESS.description: The man who has been relentlessly pursuing Sky Davis is not who he pretends to be.

THE HOST.description: Aliens control the minds and bodies of most humans, but one woman won't surrender.

THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the 40-year-old disappearance of a Swedish heiress.

UNDER THE DOME, PART 1.description: The town of Chester's Mill, Me., is suddenly and inexplicably trapped by an invisible force field. Sealed off from the rest of the world, the townspeople fall prey to a devious politician.

WATER FOR ELEPHANTS.description: A young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.

BARED TO YOU.description: Eva and Gideon, recovering from difficult pasts, develop an intense, obsessive relationship.

SOMEONE TO LOVE.description: A one-night stand turns into love for two college students.

SHADES OF GRAY.description: P.J., part of a family-run task force, doesn’t want to drag her teammates into her quest for vengeance. But her team refuses to let her go it alone.

SHADOW WOMAN.description: A woman is the target of a far-reaching conspiracy.

PRIVATE LONDON.contributor: by James Patterson and Mark Pearson
PRIVATE LONDON.description: The former Royal Military Police sergeant Dan Carter and his ex-wife, Kirsty Webb, look into why young women are being abducted in London.

EMPIRE AND HONOR.contributor: by W. E. B. Griffin and William E. Butterworth IV
EMPIRE AND HONOR.description: An O.S.S. agent’s plan to help his German intelligence counterparts reach Argentina encounters trouble; Book 7 of the Honor Bound series.

REFLECTED IN YOU.description: The sensual story that began in "Bared to You" continues, as Eva and Gideon learn more about each other and deal with unexpected challenges.

A MEMORY OF LIGHT.contributor: by Robert Jordan and Brandon Sanderson
A MEMORY OF LIGHT.description: The 14th and final novel in the Wheel of Time fantasy series.

COLLATERAL DAMAGE.description: Back in New York, the lawyer Stone Barrington joins his former partner Holly Barker in pursuing a dangerous case.

TENTH OF DECEMBER.description: Stories that take on the big questions.

DREAM EYES.description: A psychic counselor, returning to a small Oregon town after her mentor’s suspicious death, is drawn to a psychic investigator with disturbing power; a Dark Legacy novel.

THE HUSBAND LIST.contributor: by Janet Evanovich and Dorien Kelly
THE HUSBAND LIST.description: In New York City in 1894, a wealthy young woman yearns for adventure and the love of an Irish-American with new money, rather than the titled Britons to whom her mother hopes to marry her off.

THE BLOOD GOSPEL.contributor: by James Rollins and Rebecca Cantrell
THE BLOOD GOSPEL.description: A hunt for the truth about a shadowy ancient order and a book supposed to have been written in Christ’s own hand; the first book in a series, the Order of the Sanguines.

THE FIFTH ASSASSIN.description: Tracking an assassin who is recreating the crimes of the four men who murdered presidents, Beecher White discovers that they all were working together.

THE THIRD BULLET.description: The veteran sniper Bob Lee Swagger investigates the assassination of John F. Kennedy.

THE DEVIL COLONY.description: The discovery of a lost colony reveals a conspiracy from the nation's founding; a Sigma Force novel.

AGENDA 21.contributor: by Glenn Beck with Harriet Parke
AGENDA 21.description: A girl begins to question the authorities who run the Republic, the totalitarian successor to the United States created by the U.N.

PRIVATE BERLIN.contributor: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
PRIVATE BERLIN.description: A superstar agent at the German headquarters of a powerful investigation firm disappears, and the resulting search reveals many secrets.

SUSPECT.description: A Los Angeles policeman and a German shepherd that has worked in Iraq and Afghanistan, both suffering from PTSD, search for the killers of the cop’s partner.

EVER AFTER.description: The witch Rachel Morgan and an unlikely ally battle a demon in order to prevent an apocalypse

COLLIDE.description: A young woman who has just graduated from college and lost her mother gives up her thoughtful boyfriend for a rich playboy.

UNTIL THE END OF TIME.description: The stories of two relationships, at different times, intersect unexpectedly.

HEARTSONG.description: A hospital volunteer who loves to sing meets a gruff record producer who is a patient; originally published in 1984.

THE SILVER LININGS PLAYBOOK.description: A man recently released from a mental institution has two obsessions: his estranged wife and the Philadelphia Eagles. The basis of the movie; originally published in 2009.

A DEEPER LOVE INSIDE.description: A sequel to “The Coldest Winter Ever” focuses on Winter’s younger sister, Porsche Santiaga.

DYING TO READ.description: Between jobs, Cate Kinkaid goes to work for her uncle, a private investigator, but her first routine assignment turns deadly.

WARM BODIES.description: In a post-apocalyptic world plagued by the walking dead, a zombie grows close to a teenage girl and takes her under his protection.

TOUCH AND GO.description: An investigator probing the disappearance of a seemingly perfect Boston family must dig beneath the surface.

RUSH.description: Gabe Hamilton, a wealthy hotel owner, and Mia Crestwell, the much younger sister of his best friend, embark on a passionate, obsessive relationship.

LOST TO YOU.description: Christian Davison and Elizabeth Ayers meet and fall in love; a prequel to “Take This Regret.”

CRYSTAL COVE.description: Justine Hoffman, the proprietor of a hotel on the island of Friday Harbor, finally finds love — with a dangerous and mysterious man.

FOUR WEDDINGS AND A FIASCO BOXED SET.description: A boxed set contains Books 1-3 of a series set at the Rose Chalet, a wedding venue in San Francisco.

TALL, DARK AND DEADLY.description: Three passionate brothers run a security agency; a set of three novels.

A WEEK IN WINTER.description: Guests at an inn by the sea on Ireland’s west coast; the final book by Binchy, who died in 2012.

GUILT.description: The Los Angeles psychologist-detective Alex Delaware and the detective Milo Sturgis turn their sights six decades into the past to pursue the story of a beautiful nurse and her lover, a doctor.

WAIT FOR ME.description: As she digs into her past, a woman who has lost her memory in an accident is drawn to a man in San Francisco.

BEAUTIFUL BASTARD.description: Sparks fly between an Bennett Ryan, an inconsiderate boss, and his beautiful assistant, Chloe Mills.

IF YOU STAY.description: Pax, a 24-year-old bad boy, has filled the hole in his heart left by his mother’s death with drugs and women, but when he meets Mila, he wants to clean up his act.

THE POWER TRIP.description: Wealthy, famous and decadent characters gather on a luxury yacht off the coast of Cabo San Lucas.

THE INFORMATIONIST.description: The information specialist Vanessa Munroe helps a Houston oilman find his daughter, who disappeared in Africa four years earlier.

THE DINNER.description: Two couples meet in an Amsterdam restaurant to discuss their sons’ criminal activities.

ALEX CROSS, RUN.description: While Alex Cross pursues a Washington serial killer (or killers?), someone is after him.

WAITING FOR LOVE.description: Adam McCarthy runs into an old family friend with her own share of heartache. A McCarthys of Gansett Island novel.

HARD TO RESIST.description: A woman wanting to mend a broken heart tries to defy the restricting desires of a man she meets.

THE CIDER HOUSE RULES.description: Life in a Maine orphanage in the first part of the 20th century. First published in 1985.

CALCULATED IN DEATH.description: Lt. Eve Dallas must crunch the numbers as she investigates the death of a successful accountant; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.

THE STORYTELLER.description: A New Hampshire baker finds herself in the midst of two Holocaust stories: her grandmother’s story of survival, and the confessions of an elderly German man, an SS officer.

IMMORTAL EVER AFTER.description: Valerie Moyer doesn’t believe in vampires — until she is kidnapped by a fanged psychopath.

MIRROR IMAGE.description: An airplane accident and plastic surgery give a woman an astonishing new life; originally published in 1990.

EDGE OF DAWN.description: Two members of an elite group of Breed warriors struggle with their passion for each other; Book 11 in the Midnight Breed series.

THREE SISTERS.description: Three women on Blackberry Island, bound by the strongest of friendships, are at crucial turning points in their lives.

RECKLESS.description: The success of Kellan’s band poses a challenge to his relationship with Kiera.

WAIT FOR YOU.description: Nineteen-year-old Avery Morgansten hopes she can escape the tragedy in her past when she goes to college, but threats follow her.

FROST BURNED.description: The shape-shifter Mercy Thompson seeks assistance from an unlikely ally when her mate, the Alpha werewolf Adam Hauptman, and the rest of his pack are abducted.

THE STRIKER.contributor: by Clive Cussler and Justin Scott
THE STRIKER.description: In 1902, the young detective Isaac Bell discovers that provocateurs, not the union members he was hired to investigate, are causing trouble in the coal mines.

THE CHANCE.description: Teenage friends, separated by a move, come together as adults to see whether they can find love.

DAMASCUS COUNTDOWN.description: A C.I.A. operative searches for two nuclear warheads that survived an Israeli attack on Iran.

ALWAYS ON MY MIND.description: Lori Sullivan, nicknamed "Naughty," finally falls in love; the eighth Sullivan family romance.

DEFENDING JACOB.description: An assistant district attorney’s life is shaken when his shy 14-year-old son is accused of murder.

BREAKING POINT.description: The 13th novel featuring Joe Pickett, a Wyoming game warden.

NEVER TOO FAR.description: Rush and Blaire break up and she returns home to Alabama. Can she ever trust him again?

BLOODFIRE QUEST.description: The second book of the Dark Legacy of Shannara, a fantasy trilogy.

SIX YEARS.description: Six years after the woman he loved married another man, Jake Fisher discovers that neither she nor their life together were what they seemed, and he sets out to uncover the truth.

EXPOSED.description:
In Book 2 of the Just One Night series, Kasie Fitzgerald is crazy about Robert, the man she slept with in Las Vegas, but Dave, her
fiancé, is furious.

FALLING INTO YOU.description: Years after her boyfriend’s accidental death, Nell Hawthorne encounters his older brother, and they embark on a painful but ultimately healing relationship.

THE STRANGER.description: Kasie Fitzgerald sleeps with a man in Las Vegas. She meant for it to be just one night, but she winds up wanting more. Then he offers to engage her P.R. firm. Part 1 of the Just One Night series.

SURRENDER YOUR LOVE.description: Brooke Stewart, a New York real estate agent who avoids relationships, embarks on an affair with Jeff Mayfield, a millionaire playboy.

ADMISSION.description: A Princeton admissions officer is shaken when issues from her past resurface; originally published in 2009 and the basis of the recently released movie.

WITH THIS KISS.description: Lady Grace Ryburn, the daughter of the Duke and Duchess of Ashbrook from “The Ugly Duchess,” is in love with Colin Barry, a dashing young lieutenant. Will he notice her when he returns home?

HIGHLANDER MOST WANTED.description: A Highland warrior falls in love with a reclusive woman who has been the captive of a cruel laird.

LOVER AT LAST.description: Book 11 of the Black Dagger Brotherhood series.

THE WANDERER.description: Hank Cooper inherits a beachfront property in Thunder Point, Ore., and finds himself with a community’s destiny in his hands.

TWICE TEMPTED.description: Leila’s psychic abilities have been sputtering, her vampire lover seems distant, and now she’s in the crosshairs of a killer who may be closer than she realizes.

THE BURGESS BOYS.description: Two brothers, both lawyers, come together in a small Maine town to defend their good-for-nothing nephew; by the Pulitzer Prize-winning author of “Olive Kitteridge.”

SAND CASTLE BAY.description: An emergency brings Emily back home to the North Carolina coast, where the man she once loved — now a widower with a young son — longs for a second chance.

THE EDGE OF NEVER.description: A woman impulsively boards a Greyhound bus to start everything afresh, and meets a man with a dark secret.

LEAVING EVERYTHING MOST LOVED.description: In 1933, the private investigator Maisie Dobbs helps an Indian man whose sister’s murder has been ignored by Scotland Yard.

AND THEN SHE FELL.description: After breaking up an ill-suited couple, Henrietta Cynster, known in Regency-era London as “the Matchbreaker,” is obligated to find the perfect bride for the debonair James Glossup.

WALKING DISASTER.description: Travis’s life is full of fast women, underground gambling and violence. But just when he thinks he’s invincible, Abby brings him to his knees; a sequel to “Beautiful Disaster.”

FEVER.description: Jace, Ash and Gabe are powerful and used to getting anything they want. But Jace’s friendship with Ash is jeopardized when he becomes obsessed with an alluring woman; Book 2 of the Breathless trilogy.

STARTING NOW.description: A Seattle lawyer loses her job and remakes her life; she finds support at the local knitting store. A Blossom Street novel.

LIFE AFTER LIFE.description: A woman appears in different versions of the same events, centered on World War II.

TO DIE FOR.description: A set of eight novels about life and death by various authors.

OWN THE WIND.description: A member of the Chaos Motorcycle Club falls in love with the daughter of the club’s leader; a Chaos novel.

THE BET.description: Jake, a Seattle millionaire, asks his formerly estranged childhood friend Kacey to pretend to be engaged to him. But she reckoned without Jake’s brother, Travis.

MUSIC OF THE HEART.description: Abby is supposed to join her brothers' summer band tour, but she gets on the wrong bus and winds up with Jake, a womanizing rock star. Can their accidental connection endure?

DADDY'S GONE A HUNTING.description: Two sisters are threatened by a dark secret from their family’s past.

UNINTENDED CONSEQUENCES.description: The New York lawyer Stone Barrington discovers a shadowy network beneath the world of European wealth.

DON'T GO.description: An Army doctor returns from Afghanistan when his wife dies in what at first appears to be an accident, and finds that his life is falling apart.

DAMAGED.description: young woman goes to bed with a sexy man, but complications ensue. The first in a series.

ROGUE LAWYER.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.

ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.

SEE ME.description: A couple in love are threatened by secrets from the past.

THE BAZAAR OF BAD DREAMS.description: Twenty stories, some never before published.

CROSS JUSTICE.description: Detective Alex Cross returns to Starksville, N.C., his hometown, for the first time in 35 years, to help a cousin who has been accused of murder.

THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London.

THE MAGIC STRINGS OF FRANKIE PRESTO.description: A mystical tale of a guitar genius’s journey through 20th-century music.

THE GUILTY.description: The government hit man Will Robie investigates murder charges against his estranged father in their Mississippi hometown.

GO SET A WATCHMAN.description: In the mid-1950s, a grown-up Jean Louise Finch returns home to find that her adored father is not as perfect as she believed.

TOM CLANCY: COMMANDER IN CHIEF.description: President Jack Ryan detects a pattern in outbreaks of violence around the world that point to the Russian president, but he must unite the Western allies before he can take action. Clancy died in 2013.

THE NIGHTINGALE.description: Two sisters in World War II France: one struggling to survive in the countryside, the other joining the Resistance in Paris.

TRICKY TWENTY-TWO.description: The New Jersey bounty hunter Stephanie Plum pursues a fraternity member arrested for beating up a college dean and investigates a murder.

ASHLEY BELL.description: A young Southern California writer who survived a fatal diagnosis sets out to find a woman she has been told she must save, overcoming many obstacles in the process.

A KNIGHT OF THE SEVEN KINGDOMS.description: A collection of three official prequels to “A Song of Ice and Fire.”

THE GIRL IN THE SPIDER'S WEB.description: Mikael Blomkvist and Lisbeth Salander are back in this continuation of Stieg Larsson’s Millennium series.

THE CROSSING.description: The retired detective Harry Bosch reluctantly agrees to help his half brother, a defense attorney.

THE BONE LABYRINTH.description: A techno-thriller follows a government think tank's elite military unit as it takes on spies, counterspies and simian hybrids.

FATES AND FURIES.description: The story of a marriage, and of the personal tragedies that govern it, is told from each spouse’s perspective, with inspiration from classical themes.

THE SURVIVOR.contributor: by Vince Flynn and Kyle Mills
THE SURVIVOR.description: The counterterrorism operative Mitch Rapp must control the damage from a leak of C.I.A. documents. Mills finished the book for Flynn, who died in 2013.

AVENUE OF MYSTERIES.description: In Irving’s 14th novel, a Mexican writer on a journey to the Philippines recalls his escape from a humble childhood.

THE MARTIAN.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.

THE LAST ANNIVERSARY.description: A family home on an Australian island is bequeathed to an outsider and the clan's conflicts and secrets along with it.

MY BRILLIANT FRIEND.description: The first installment in the author’s Neapolitan series, about the lifelong friendship between two women.

POINT BLANK.description: The Sisterhood heads to Asia to locate a missing daughter.

THE CHOICE.description: When Travis meets his new neighbor, his bachelor status erodes.

PRETTY GIRLS.description: A woman discovers secrets about her husband that lead her to reconnect with her estranged sister.

THE FORGOTTEN SOLDIER.description: Pike Logan is called on to take out a rogue Taskforce operator.

JANUARY.description: Mia becomes a high-priced escort to pay off her father's gambling debts.

ANYTHING FOR YOU.description: When her partner of 10 years pops the question, Jess drops a bomb by saying no.

THE REVENANT.description: Left for dead after a mauling, the master tracker Hugh Glass is consumed by a singular desire for revenge; an inspiration for the 2015 film.

SCANDALOUS BEHAVIOR.description: Stone Barrington seeks a restful stay in the English countryside, but relationships with neighbors complicate matters.

MY NAME IS LUCY BARTON.description: A woman struggles with memories of her impoverished and disturbing childhood and its effect on the present as she attempts to reconcile with her mother.

THE SCORE.description: A newly single graduate finds her attentions turning to a hockey star.

SEBRING.description: A schemer finds an outsider like himself, but does she need to be protected from his wiles?

THE BITTER SEASON.description: Minneapolis detectives Nikki Liska and Sam Kovac investigate separate cases that eventually intersect.

THE FORCE AWAKENS.description: There are new disturbances in the force in this novelization of the film franchise's seventh installment.

A PARIS APARTMENT.description: A high-end appraiser unpacks the provenance of a Belle Epoque portrait.

THE BAKER'S DAUGHTER.description: A magazine writer becomes caught up in a woman’s story of her painful experiences in Germany in World War II.

FEBRUARY.description: An escort becomes a French artist's muse for a month to pay off her father's gambling debts.

BIG ROCK.description: A playboy has his business partner pose as his fiancée during a crucial family business transaction.

BROTHERHOOD IN DEATH.description: Lt. Eve Dallas of the N.Y.P.D. helps a friend and her husband solve a mystery involving politics and real estate; by Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.

BREAKDOWN.description: The psychologist Alex Delaware and the L.A.P.D. Lt. Milo Sturgis search for the missing son of a psychologically fragile actress.

ME BEFORE YOU.description: A young woman who has barely been farther afield than her English village finds herself while caring for a wealthy, embittered quadriplegic. Originally published in 2012.

NYPD RED 4.contributor: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
NYPD RED 4.description: Detective Zach Gordon and his partner, members of an elite task force that protects the rich and famous, pursue a cold-blooded killer.

DEPRAVED HEART.description: A psychopath sends Dr. Kay Scarpetta videos from the past about her niece in the series’s 23rd book.

BLUE.description: A woman whose life has been shattered befriends a homeless boy.

WICKED SEXY LIAR.description: In Book 4 of the Wild Seasons series, three college friends meet three hot guys in Vegas.

THE BALLER.description: After a locker-room interview of a Super Bowl M.V.P., a sportscaster decides to alter her dating rules.

COMETH THE HOUR.description: The sixth and penultimate book of the Clifton Chronicles brings the Cliftons and the Barringtons into the 1970s.

ROOMHATE.description: A woman must share an inherited house with the man she dumped long ago.

FIND HER.description: The detective D.  D. Warren hunts for a missing woman who was kidnapped and abused as a student and may have become a vigilante.

THE NEXT ALWAYS.description: A historic hotel in Maryland is getting a face-lift from the Montgomery brothers and their eccentric mother; Book 1 of the Inn BoonsBoro trilogy.

THE LIE.description: Brigs and Natasha each look to turn from their tragic pasts with a fresh start in London.

THE WIDOW.description: When a suspect in a missing-child case dies, reporters and the police think they’ll get the real story from his widow. They’re wrong.

BACKWARD GLANCE.description: A meddling mother schemes to get her daughter and a handyman back together.

UNFINISHED BUSINESS.description: Former high school sweethearts fall tentatively back into each other’s orbits after more than a decade.

THE GANGSTER.contributor: by Clive Cussler and Justin Scott
THE GANGSTER.description: In the ninth book in this series, set in 1906, the New York detective Isaac Bell contends with a crime boss passing as a respectable businessman and a tycoon’s plot against President Theodore Roosevelt.

ROOM.description: The entire world of the 5-year-old boy who narrates this novel is the 11-by-11-foot room in which his mother is being held prisoner.

THE WEDDING DRESS.description: With her own wedding approaching, Charlotte pieces together the history of a vintage gown she finds.

KEEP QUIET.description: A father hides a terrible secret to protect his son.

THE KITCHEN HOUSE.description: An Irish orphan is integrated into a slave family on a Virginia plantation.

THE LIAR.description: A woman returning to her hometown discovers that her husband was a fraud who implicated her in his deceptions.

MEMORY MAN.description: A police detective who left the force when his family was murdered teams up with his former partner to solve the case.

BROOKLYN.description: An unsophisticated young Irishwoman leaves her home for New York in the 1950s. The basis of the movie.

BEAUTIFUL BOSS.description: Will Sumner and Hanna Bergstrom find that a wedding and everlasting love were just the beginning.

A GIRL'S GUIDE TO MOVING ON.description: A mother and her daughter-in-law both leave unhappy marriages and take up with new men.

THE ENEMY INSIDE.description: Defending an innocent young man, the defense attorney Paul Madriani uncovers a morass of corruption and greed that leads to the highest levels of political power.

PRIVATE PARIS.contributor: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
PRIVATE PARIS.description: Jack Morgan, the head of the Private global investigative agency, probes the murders of members of the French cultural elite.

PROPERTY OF A NOBLEWOMAN.description: Two New Yorkers searching for the owner of an abandoned safe-deposit box reconstruct the history of a young woman and a forbidden love affair at the time of World War II.

DARK PROMISES.description: A Carpathian novel; the 29th book in the Dark series.

PLAYING THE ODDS.description: Serena conceals her privileged upbringing by taking a job as a blackjack dealer on a cruise ship.

OFF THE GRID.description: The 16th Joe Pickett novel features Nate Romanowski and a search for a domestic terror cell.

HAWKE.description: A hockey defenseman and a reformed partier reunite seven years after their relationship foundered.

DEEP BLUE.description: Doc Ford, a Florida marine biologist and former government agent, tracks an American who is working with ISIS.

THE STEEL KISS.description: Lincoln Rhyme and his new assistant, also a paraplegic, investigate a domestic terrorist who sabotages equipment.

IF I DIDN'T KNOW BETTER.description: When Mia heads to Angel's Bay to clean out her aunt's house, her attentions increasingly drift to the wounded veteran next door.

FIRE TOUCHED.description: The shape-shifter Mercy Thompson and her Alpha werewolf mate, Adam, protect a stolen human child.

FOOL ME ONCE.description: A retired Army helicopter pilot faces combat-related nightmares and mysteries concerning the deaths of her husband and sister.

BECAUSE OF MISS BRIDGERTON.description: Billie finds that, despite herself, she's drifting toward the arrogant George.

THE NEST.description: Siblings in a dysfunctional New York family must grapple with a reduced inheritance.

JOURNEY TO MUNICH.description: In 1938, the psychologist Maisie Dobbs travels to Germany to impersonate the daughter of a prisoner.

MAKE ME.description: Jack Reacher pries open a missing-persons case that takes him across the country and into the shadowy reaches of the Internet.

PARTNERS.description: The defense attorney Sebastian Rudd develops a close working relationship with his bodyguard and sidekick, Partner. A standalone digital short-story prequel to "Rogue Lawyer."

ONCE A RANCHER.description: A troubled teenager helps bring together his harried guardian and a filmmaker who has returned to the family ranch.

NOBODY BUT YOU.description: After a disastrous mission, a soldier heads to a lakeside cabin where a wayward woman has docked her boat.

DADDY'S GIRL.description: A law professor caught in a prison riot must defend herself when she is unjustly accused of murder.

LOGAN KADE.description: Taylor sees the stress and struggle that give rise to Logan's rebellious behavior.

A BRUSH OF WINGS.description: A baseball player intercedes when an ailing orphanage worker in Uganda needs a transplant.

THE OBSESSION.description: A woman is haunted by her father’s crimes as she tries to pursue love and her work as a photographer.

ONE WITH YOU.description: The chronicle of a tempestuous marriage comes to a close.

STUCK-UP SUIT.contributor: by Vi Keeland and Penelope Ward
STUCK-UP SUIT.description: An arrogant businessman's phone, lost on a commuter train, leads to an unexpected affair.

MOST WANTED.description: A woman discovers that her sperm donor is a murderer.

NOW THAT I'VE FOUND YOU.description: An artist breaks his rule of never painting women when he meets a reality TV star.

AS TIME GOES BY.description: Secrets emerge when a television journalist searching for her birth mother covers the trial of the widow of a wealthy doctor.

THE MURDER HOUSE.contributor: by James Patterson and David Ellis
THE MURDER HOUSE.description: When bodies are found at a Hamptons estate where a series of grisly murders once occurred, a local detective and former New York City cop investigates.

THE PLAYER.description: A grifter weds a man with a shadowy past in the third installment of the Game Maker series.

THE 14TH COLONY.description: The covert operative Cotton Malone must thwart an agent loyal to the former Soviet Union.

LISTEN TO ME.description: Everything changes for a restaurateur when a former rock star walks into her Portland hotspot.

FAMILY JEWELS.description: In the 37th Stone Barrington novel, the lawyer becomes entangled in a mystery involving a wealthy divorcée’s ex-husband.

MILLER'S VALLEY.description: A young woman comes of age during an assault on the land and the people she loves.

WHISPER BEACH.description: Three women reunite in the beach town that formed them.

EXTREME PREY.description: Lucas Davenport, who has left the Minnesota Bureau of Criminal Apprehension, is in Iowa trying to foil a plot to assassinate a Hillary Clinton-like candidate. The 26th Lucas Davenport thriller.

THE LAST MILE.description: In a sequel to “Memory Man,” Amos Decker, a detective with an extraordinary memory, investigates the case of a convicted killer who wins a last-minute reprieve.

FIRE BOUND.description: A glassblower travels to Italy, where her bodyguard catches her eye.

BEST OF MY LOVE.description: A baker and an adventure-travel agent navigate the claustrophobia of love in a small town.

HIDE AWAY.description: A forensic sculptor heads to the Scottish Highlands in search of treasure.

AIN'T SHE SWEET.description: While training for a marathon, a man finds a prickly paramour.

ELIGIBLE.description: The author of “Prep” and “American Wife” retells “Pride and Prejudice,” set in the Cincinnati suburbs in the present.

A MAN CALLED OVE.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.

A BUCCANEER AT HEART.description: Volume 2 of the Adventurers Quartet, a romantic mystery that reaches across the high seas from England to Africa.

BOB DYLAN: ALL THE SONGS.description: The story behind nearly every studio song, 492 of them, from the early 1960s to 2015.

THE RAP YEAR BOOK.description: The most important rap song from every year since 1979, discussed, debated and deconstructed.

SAM PHILLIPS.description: The biography of a rock ’n’ roll pioneer who discovered some of its earliest and most enduring artists.

HARLEM.description: The four hundred year history, from Dutch Village to capital of Black America.

MY SOUTHERN JOURNEY.description: More than a decade's worth of essays about the South, covering topics like football, fishing and food.

WILD.description: A woman’s account of the life-changing 1,100-mile solo hike she took along the Pacific Crest Trail in 1995; a 2014 movie.

RARELY SEEN.description: Photographs of isolated places, natural phenomena and extraordinary moments in nature that are seldom - if ever - seen by human eyes.

A WALK IN THE WOODS.description: A journey to rediscover America by trekking the 2,100 miles of the Appalachian Trail.

KNITLANDIA.description: A knitter's guide to 17 yarn-rich locales around the world.

TURN RIGHT AT MACHU PICCHU.description: Retracing a journey to the Incas’ city.
